text: 16.19 While of a similar scale to neighbourhood centres, Redchurch Street, Columbia Road, and Hackney Wick serve specialist roles and are therefore given a different designation. Redchurch Street contains a significant cluster of fashion shops that attracts customers from across London as well as a strong food and beverage offer that supports the night-time economy; this cluster will be protected and enhanced by ensuring that new development within Redchurch Street Centre includes small retail and other commercial units that meet the needs of
